short_description: the lion east bergholt is a pub/bar based in colchester, united kingdom.
long_description: the award winning lion, built in the late 17th century, has undergone a complete refurbishment. there is a large, free, newly renovated car park for patrons of the lion, villagers and walkers, that is suitable for all vehicles, including coaches. there is a wonderful garden, a heated sail cloth tent in the summer months and beautifully cooked food and fine wines. take away coffee also available. why not join us for some pre-dinner cocktails. come and enjoy a fine selection of locally grown fresh food, as recognised in 2022 by the east of england tourism awards as we won the award for taste of east of england and 2023 “pub of the year” . we look forward to welcoming you all.
generated_description: the lion, east bergholt is a gastropub located in colchester, england. it operates as a bar, event venue, and hotel. the establishment offers a variety of services including dine-in, outdoor seating, and wheelchair accessibility. it serves a range of beverages such as beer, cocktails, coffee, and wine, as well as a variety of food options including breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner, and dessert. the venue is suitable for groups and welcomes diverse clientele, including lgbtq+ individuals. it accepts various payment methods including credit and debit cards, as well as mobile nfc payments.
